QuestData.Title: Family Traditions
QuestData.Description: He ran off with it! Oh what am I going to do, what am I going to DO?$B$BMy son, and my knife, they ran off to Blackrock Spire! Well, the knife didn't run, I suppose. That doesn't matter!$B$BYou've got to get it back! Yes, the knife! You've got to get me back my knife!$B$BGo! Now! Stop talking!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Pip's Improved Skinner in Blackrock Spire.
